segment.source: Turn off natural metrics for Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Turn off natural metrics for Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Fix font rendering problems by turning off natural metrics (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Fix font rendering problems by turning off natural metrics (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Fix font rendering problems by turning off natural metrics
segment.target: Fix font rendering problems by turning off natural metrics

segment.source: By default, Internet Explorer 11 uses “natural metrics”.
segment.target: By default, Internet Explorer 11 uses “natural metrics”.

segment.source: Natural metrics use inter-pixel spacing that creates more accurately rendered and readable text, avoiding many common font rendering problems with Windows Internet Explorer 9 or older sites.
segment.target: Natural metrics use inter-pixel spacing that creates more accurately rendered and readable text, avoiding many common font rendering problems with Windows Internet Explorer 9 or older sites.

segment.source: However, you might find that many intranet sites need you to use Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) metrics.
segment.target: However, you might find that many intranet sites need you to use Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI) metrics.

segment.source: To avoid potential compatibility issues, you must turn off natural metrics for those sites.
segment.target: To avoid potential compatibility issues, you must turn off natural metrics for those sites.

segment.source: Add the following HTTP header to each site:
segment.target: Add the following HTTP header to each site:

segment.source: Add the following meta tag to each site:
segment.target: Add the following meta tag to each site:

segment.source: Turning off natural metrics automatically turns on GDI metrics.
segment.target: Turning off natural metrics automatically turns on GDI metrics.
